title: Ep. 406: Stan Lee on Race-Swaps | More Spider-Folk
itunes:title: Stan Lee on Race-Swaps | More Spider-Folk
description: In this episode of For Canon Sake, we talk about the addition of more Spider-Folk with Marvel. We also discuss Rick Riordan gaslighting his fans.
